references: A. H. R. Grimsey, On the accumulation of chance effects and the Gaussian frequency distribution, Phil. Mag., 36 (1945), 294-295.
R. G. Medhurst and J. H. Roberts, Evaluation of the integral I_n(b) = (2/pi)*Integral_{0..inf} (sin x / x)^n cos (bx) dx, Math. Comp., 19 (1965), 113-117.
N. J. A. Sloane, A Handbook of Integer Sequences, Academic Press, 1973 (includes this sequence).
N. J. A. Sloane and Simon Plouffe, The Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences, Academic Press, 1995 (includes this sequence).
links: T. D. Noe, Table of n, a(n) for n=1..100
mathematica: a[n_] := Numerator[ (2/Pi)*Integrate[ (Sin[x]/x)^n, {x, 0, Infinity}] ]; Table[ a[n], {n, 1, 21}] (* _Jean-Fran√ßois Alcover_, Dec 19 2011 *)
prog: (PARI) a(n) = numerator((n/2^(n-1)) * sum(r=0, n/2, (-1)^r*(n-2*r)^(n-1)/(r!*(n-r)!))); \\ _Michel Marcus_, Oct 02 2013
crossrefs: Cf. A002298 (for denominators), A002304, A002305. Essentially the same as A049330, except for the n=4 term.
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
